note:
Infosec/privacy geek. Here to learn and boost. Professionally I deal mostly with the "softer" aspects of infosec: ISMS, infosec risk management, GDPR and security culture. First got into privacy back in the nineties. MSc in infosec and BEng in graphic production and usability.
English language version of me. Norwegian version found @Reea
Owner of Paco the #kakariki and member of 2017 grammy nominee Bergen Philharmonic Choir. Might suddenly burst into choir related stuff, or even labour law, sceptisism or linguistics...
